name: DeepWiki Open DevContainer
postCreateCommand: pip install -r api/requirements.txt && npm install -g npm && corepack enable && corepack prepare yarn@stable --activate && npm install
postStartCommand:
echo '
# 1. Create a `.env` file '
echo '# 2. Start the API server'
echo 'python -m api.main'
echo '# 3. Start the web app'
echo 'npm run dev
'
